definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[קין]] (√ of foll.; cf. Ar. qa0na fit together, fabricate (make artificially), forge (cf. Wetzst:Syr.Dreschtafel (1873) 297), whence qaynun worker in iron, As. ḳinai (Meissn:Za viii (1893), 82), Targum [[קֵינׇאָה]], Syr. qaynoyo0, Palm. [[קיניא]] (pl.) metal-worker, cf. BH [[תּוּבַל קַיִן]]; also Ar. qaynah;un slave-girl, and woman-singer, lute-player (fr. skill); cf. Eth. qni: song, singing, Syr. qiynto0, hymn, elegy; Ar. vb. Iv Dozy; NH [[קִינׇה]] = BH; cf. also Bu:ZAW ii (1882), 28).
